                <li class="tab_li" node-type="tab_hot" action-type="search_type" action-data="profile_ftype=1&amp;is_hot=1">
                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" suda-uatrack="key=tblog_profile_v6&amp;value=topnav" class="S_txt1"><em class="W_ficon ficon_hot S_ficon">ì</em>热门</a>
                    <span class="ani_border"></span>
                </li>
                <li class="tab_li" node-type="tab_other" action-type="search_type">
                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1">
                        <span class="txt" node-type="menutext">
                                                            更多                                                    </span>
                        <i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down W_f16 S_ficon" node-type="morebtn">c</i>
                    </a>
                    <span class="ani_border"></span>
                </li>
            </ul>

                    <li><span class="line S_line1"><a node-type="feed_list_commentTabAll" href="javascript:void(0)" action-type="feed_list_commentSearch" action-data="mid=4486832589107827&amp;filter=all" class="S_txt1">按时间</a></span></li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                            </div>
            <!-- 列表-标题 -->

            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%8C%E5%8D%81%E5%9B%BD%E9%9B%86%E5%9B%A2%E9%A2%86%E5%AF%BC%E4%BA%BA%E5%BA%94%E5%AF%B9%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%89%B9%E5%88%AB%E5%B3%B0%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#二十国集团领导人应对新冠肺炎特别峰会#</a>【习近平：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9D%9A%E5%86%B3%E6%89%93%E5%A5%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E9%98%BB%E5%87%BB%E6%88%98%23&amp;from=default">#坚决打好新冠肺炎疫情防控全球阻击战#</a>】习近平强调，国际社会应该加紧行动起来，坚决打好新冠肺炎疫情防控全球阻击战，遏制疫情蔓延势头。中方秉持人类命运共同体理念，愿同有关国家分享防控有益做法，开展药物和疫苗联合研发，并向出现疫情扩散的国 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAqT73KzS" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486831690894032:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486831690894032&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_like" action-data="version=mini&amp;qid=heart&amp;mid=4486831690894032&amp;loc=profile&amp;cuslike=1&amp;hide_multi_attitude=1&amp;liked=0" title="赞" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=like"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1">

            </ul>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#全球抗疫第一线#</a>【直播！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%A0%E6%96%87%E5%AE%8F%E7%AD%94%E7%95%99%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E5%8D%8E%E4%BE%A8%E5%8D%8E%E4%BA%BA%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98%23&amp;from=default">#张文宏答留学生华侨华人抗疫问题#</a>】美国纽约州、华盛顿州、加州等8州被列为疫情“重大灾区”。如出现疑似症状但医院不接治该怎么办？缺少消毒用品时应如何防护？中国驻美国大使馆邀请张文宏教授，在线解答留学生、华侨华人抗疫问题↓关注！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4486831296833897:1034-video:1034%3A4486856507588647:page_100206_home:2656274875:4486831296833897:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6Z2Pufs" alt="http://t.cn/A6Z2Pufs" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4486831020479305" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAqS220GJ?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-26 20:55" date="1585227339000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486831020479305:fromprofile"> 3月26日 20:55</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【习近平：国际社会最需要的是<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9D%9A%E5%AE%9A%E4%BF%A1%E5%BF%83%E5%9B%A2%E7%BB%93%E5%BA%94%E5%AF%B9%23&amp;from=default">#坚定信心团结应对#</a>】国家主席习近平26日晚在北京出席<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%8C%E5%8D%81%E5%9B%BD%E9%9B%86%E5%9B%A2%E9%A2%86%E5%AF%BC%E4%BA%BA%E5%BA%94%E5%AF%B9%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%89%B9%E5%88%AB%E5%B3%B0%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#二十国集团领导人应对新冠肺炎特别峰会#</a>。习近平强调，新冠肺炎疫情正在全球蔓延，国际社会最需要的是坚定信心、齐心协力、团结应对，全面加强国际合作，凝聚起战胜疫情强大合力，携手赢得这场人类同重大传染性疾病的 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAqS220GJ" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486831020479305:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486831020479305&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2656274875/IAqS220GJ&amp;mid=4486831020479305&amp;name=央视新闻&amp;uid=2656274875&amp;domain=cctvxinwen" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>168</em></span></span></span></a>

                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%9C%B1%E5%B9%BF%E6%9D%83%E6%8F%90%E9%86%92%E4%BD%A0%E8%A1%A3%E7%89%A9%E5%A2%9E%E5%87%8F%E8%A6%81%E9%9A%8F%E6%9C%BA%E5%BA%94%E5%8F%98%23&amp;from=default">#朱广权提醒你衣物增减要随机应变#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%9C%B1%E5%B9%BF%E6%9D%83?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=朱广权">@朱广权</a> ：寒潮来袭，多地降温超过10℃，原本下岗的棉服又有了新的就业出路，走在保暖时尚最前沿还得靠秋裤。春天里气温按下“随机键”，不要被它前两天的温柔欺骗，衣服的增减要随机应变。网上推出了全国乱穿衣预警地图，快来看看你家降温到什么程度？&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAqIXDbMv" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486825399340083:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486825399340083&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%8C%E5%8D%81%E5%9B%BD%E9%9B%86%E5%9B%A2%E9%A2%86%E5%AF%BC%E4%BA%BA%E5%BA%94%E5%AF%B9%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%89%B9%E5%88%AB%E5%B3%B0%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#二十国集团领导人应对新冠肺炎特别峰会#</a>开始举行】今晚20：00，二十国集团领导人应对新冠肺炎特别峰会开始举行，中国国家主席习近平在北京出席。 ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E5%86%85%E8%88%AA%E7%A9%BA%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8%E8%87%B3%E4%BB%BB%E4%B8%80%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%B6%E8%88%AA%E7%BA%BF%E5%8F%AA%E4%BF%9D%E7%95%991%E6%9D%A1%23&amp;from=default">#国内航空公司至任一国家航线只保留1条#</a>】民航局今天发布通知：进一步调减国际客运航班运行数量。国内每家航空公司经营至任一国家航线只保留1条，每条航线每周运营班次不得超1班；外国每家航空公司经营至我国航线只保留1条，每周运营班次不得超1班。抵离中国航班确保客座率不高于75%。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAqxC76vI" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486818361693326:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486818361693326&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【习近平将出席<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%8C%E5%8D%81%E5%9B%BD%E9%9B%86%E5%9B%A2%E9%A2%86%E5%AF%BC%E4%BA%BA%E5%BA%94%E5%AF%B9%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%89%B9%E5%88%AB%E5%B3%B0%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#二十国集团领导人应对新冠肺炎特别峰会#</a>】26日晚，国家主席习近平将在北京出席<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%8C%E5%8D%81%E5%9B%BD%E9%9B%86%E5%9B%A2%E9%A2%86%E5%AF%BC%E4%BA%BA%E5%BA%94%E5%AF%B9%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%89%B9%E5%88%AB%E5%B3%B0%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#二十国集团领导人应对新冠肺炎特别峰会#</a>。此次峰会由今年二十国集团主席国沙特阿拉伯王国主办，将以视频方式举行。（央视记者申勇 史伟） <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4486813613449871:1034-video:1034%3A4486813474029613:page_100206_home:2656274875:4486813613449871:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZARUJ7" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZARUJ7" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

    <div class="WB_feed_handle" node-type="feed_list_options">

        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【中央应对新冠肺炎疫情工作领导小组：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A6%81%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E7%BB%8F%E9%99%86%E8%B7%AF%E6%B0%B4%E8%B7%AF%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E9%A3%8E%E9%99%A9%23&amp;from=default">#要防控境外疫情经陆路水路输入风险#</a>】26日，中央应对新冠肺炎疫情工作领导小组会议指出，境外疫情大流行呈加速趋势。要压实属地责任，加强陆路水路防输入输出工作。除边民和外交、重要经贸科技人员外，对<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%99%86%E8%BF%90%E5%8F%A3%E5%B2%B8%E5%85%A5%E5%A2%83%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E6%8C%89%E8%A7%84%E5%AE%9A%E9%9B%86%E4%B8%AD%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%23&amp;from=default">#陆运口岸入境人员按规定集中隔离#</a>。保持跨境货运畅通，落 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAqmvCqYN" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486811479160177:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486811479160177&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <div comment_id="4486812221349533" node-type="root_comment" class="list_li S_line1 clearfix">

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4486807846799708" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAqgEswUI?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-26 19:23" date="1585221813000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486807846799708:fromprofile"> 3月26日 19:23</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【中共中央国务院：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E5%8A%B3%E5%8A%A8%E7%B4%A0%E5%85%BB%E8%AF%84%E4%BB%B7%E5%B0%86%E6%88%90%E5%BD%95%E5%8F%96%E9%87%8D%E8%A6%81%E5%8F%82%E8%80%83%23&amp;from=default">#学生劳动素养评价将成录取重要参考#</a>】中共中央、国务院近日发布相关意见，提出要<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9C%A8%E5%A4%A7%E4%B8%AD%E5%B0%8F%E5%AD%A6%E8%AE%BE%E7%AB%8B%E5%8A%B3%E5%8A%A8%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2%E5%BF%85%E4%BF%AE%E8%AF%BE%23&amp;from=default">#在大中小学设立劳动教育必修课#</a>；把劳动素养评价结果作为评优评先的重要参考和毕业依据，作为高一级学校录取的重要参考或依据；让学生动手实践出力流汗、体认劳动不分贵贱，尊重普通劳动者↓&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAqgEswUI" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486807846799708:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486807846799708&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                <li><a action-type="thrid_rend_iframe" href="javascript:void(0)" suda-data="" action-data="width=660&amp;height=556&amp;mid=4486805120057957&amp;src=%2F%2Fpromote.vip.weibo.com%2Fpromoteadvance%3Fdai_tou%3Dpc_profile_01%26touid%3D2656274875%26mid%3D4486805120057957&amp;title=推广" title="帮上头条">帮上头条</a></li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <li>
                                <span class="hover">
                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IAqcg0f4N&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fcctvxinwen&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609351460&amp;ssig=KEk6spZ7O0" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4486805120057957" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAqcg0f4N?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-26 19:12" date="1585221164000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486805120057957:fromprofile"> 3月26日 19:12</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【有需要就扫它！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%A9%BB%E9%9F%A9%E5%A4%A7%E4%BD%BF%E5%9C%A8%E7%BA%BF%E6%8E%A8%E8%8D%90%E5%81%A5%E5%BA%B7%E5%8C%85%E4%BA%8C%E7%BB%B4%E7%A0%81%23&amp;from=default">#驻韩大使在线推荐健康包二维码#</a>】中国驻韩国大使邢海明说，使馆积极推动韩国高校协助为同学们解决口罩难题，他已<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BB%99200%E5%A4%9A%E5%90%8D%E9%9F%A9%E5%9B%BD%E6%A0%A1%E9%95%BF%E5%86%99%E4%BF%A1%E6%8B%9C%E6%89%98%E7%85%A7%E9%A1%BE%E7%95%99%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%23&amp;from=default">#给200多名韩国校长写信拜托照顾留学生#</a>，帮助留学生解决实际问题。另外，使馆正同国内联系协调口罩等物资，他在直播中摆出健康包报名二维码↓“只要我们能做的，一定尽 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAqcg0f4N" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486805120057957:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486805120057957&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4486803182652695" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAq98b85p?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-26 19:05" date="1585220702000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486803182652695:fromprofile"> 3月26日 19:05</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content">
                                                                                                                        【逛吃逛吃！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%87%8D%E5%BA%86%E5%95%86%E5%9C%88%E7%9A%84%E7%83%9F%E7%81%AB%E6%B0%94%E5%9B%9E%E6%9D%A5%E4%BA%86%23&amp;from=default">#重庆商圈的烟火气回来了#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/f6/2018new_aini_org.png" title="[爱你]" alt="[爱你]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】观音桥商圈，重庆人最爱去的商圈之一。随着疫情的好转，这里逐渐恢复往日的热闹景象，充满烟火气！围观直播↓↓（总台央视记者伍黎明）                                            </div>

            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4486798271465700" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAq1d69ik?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-26 18:45" date="1585219531000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486798271465700:fromprofile"> 3月26日 18:45</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E5%85%A8%E5%B8%823.8%E4%B8%87%E7%A4%BE%E5%8C%BA%E5%8C%BB%E5%8A%A1%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E8%87%B3%E4%BB%8A%E9%9B%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%23&amp;from=default">#北京全市3.8万社区医务人员至今零感染#</a>】北京市卫健委新闻发言人高小俊：①北京市4000余个家庭医生团队融入社区管理网格；②社区卫生服务机构提供长期处方服务96.7万人次，减少居民往返医院；③实行测温、排队1米线、线上开药方等措施，北京全市3.8万名基层社区医务人员迄今为止实现“零感染”。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAq1d69ik" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486798271465700:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486798271465700&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4486792474477203" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IApRRiMIX?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-26 18:22" date="1585218149000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486792474477203:fromprofile"> 3月26日 18:22</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【一段视频揭秘<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%89%B9%E6%9C%97%E6%99%AE%E9%AB%98%E5%B0%94%E5%A4%AB%E4%BF%B1%E4%B9%90%E9%83%A8%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E5%85%B3%E7%B3%BB%E7%BD%91%23&amp;from=default">#特朗普高尔夫俱乐部新冠感染关系网#</a>】据美媒报道，截至当地时间26日，一场在洛杉矶特朗普国家高尔夫俱乐部举行的生日宴会，致至少17人确诊感染新冠肺炎，其中包括多名政要。多人传递话筒送祝福、忽视“不要拥抱”等警告……看事件回顾↓特朗普集团旗下多家酒店和高尔夫球场已关闭。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IApRRiMIX" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486792474477203:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486792474477203&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                <li>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E9%A9%BB%E9%9F%A9%E5%A4%A7%E4%BD%BF%E8%BF%9E%E7%BA%BF%E5%9C%A8%E9%9F%A9%E7%95%99%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%23&amp;from=default">#中国驻韩大使连线在韩留学生#</a>】3月，韩国疫情蔓延速度放缓，单日新增确诊病例回落至百例上下，境外输入病例渐成防控重点。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9C%A8%E9%9F%A9%E7%95%99%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E5%AD%A6%E4%B8%9A%E7%94%9F%E6%B4%BB%E6%98%AF%E5%90%A6%E6%AD%A5%E5%85%A5%E6%AD%A3%E8%BD%A8%23&amp;from=default">#在韩留学生学业生活是否步入正轨#</a>？旅韩华侨在工作、防护等方面有哪些须留意？使馆能提供哪些帮助？中国驻韩国大使邢海明在线与留学人员和教师交流↓ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4486787093516128:1034-video:1034%3A4486803655163907:page_100206_home:2656274875:4486787093516128:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZAxaVe" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZAxaVe" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <li>
                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=2679372361&amp;cid=4486794885919617&amp;nick=延世大学学人学者联谊会&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2656274875&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4486783540435888" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IApDs1Pos?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-26 17:46" date="1585216019000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486783540435888:fromprofile"> 3月26日 17:46</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【18时起，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A5%E5%A2%83%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%E5%85%A8%E9%83%A8%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E4%B8%80%E5%BE%8B%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%E8%A7%82%E5%AF%9F14%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#入境上海全部人员一律隔离观察14天#</a>】上海市新冠肺炎疫情防控工作领导小组办公室决定，自今天18时起，对入境来沪的全部人员，一律实施为期14天的隔离健康观察（对入境的外交人员和从事重要经贸、科研、技术合作的人员，另有规定的按规定执行）。各区、各有关部门要严防境外疫情输入。（总台 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IApDs1Pos" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486783540435888:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486783540435888&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                <a name="4486779711557826" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IApxh6xge?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-26 17:31" date="1585215106000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486779711557826:fromprofile"> 3月26日 17:31</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B9%A0%E8%BF%91%E5%B9%B3%E5%A4%8D%E4%BF%A1%E4%B8%96%E5%8D%AB%E7%BB%84%E7%BB%87%E6%80%BB%E5%B9%B2%E4%BA%8B%E8%B0%AD%E5%BE%B7%E5%A1%9E%23&amp;from=default">#习近平复信世卫组织总干事谭德塞#</a>】3月26日，国家主席习近平复信世界卫生组织总干事谭德塞，赞赏谭德塞为推动全球抗击新冠肺炎疫情所作努力，表示中国将继续为国际社会抗击疫情提供支持。<br>3月17日，谭德塞致函国家主席习近平，表示在习近平主席的卓越领导下，中国为抗击新冠肺炎疫情付出了令人难以 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IApxh6xge" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486779711557826:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486779711557826&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

    </div>

        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->

        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>

                                <a name="4486775924279362" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAprahXfY?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-26 17:16" date="1585214203000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486775924279362:fromprofile"> 3月26日 17:16</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【转发祝贺！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%91%E5%9B%BD%E6%B5%B7%E5%9F%9F%E5%8F%AF%E7%87%83%E5%86%B0%E8%AF%95%E9%87%87%E7%A0%B4%E6%80%BB%E9%87%8F%E6%97%A5%E5%9D%87%E5%8F%8C%E7%BA%AA%E5%BD%95%23&amp;from=default">#我国海域可燃冰试采破总量日均双纪录#</a>】自然资源部宣布，我国海域可燃冰第二轮试采取得圆满成功。本次是<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E9%A6%96%E6%AC%A1%E5%88%A9%E7%94%A8%E6%B0%B4%E5%B9%B3%E4%BA%95%E9%92%BB%E9%87%87%E8%AF%95%E9%87%87%E6%B5%B7%E5%9F%9F%E5%8F%AF%E7%87%83%E5%86%B0%23&amp;from=default">#全球首次利用水平井钻采试采海域可燃冰#</a>。2月17日至3月18日，连续产气30天，累计产气量86.14万立方米，日均2.87万立方米，创造产气总量最大、日均产气量最高两项世界纪录。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAprahXfY" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486775924279362:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486775924279362&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->

        <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/6349731152"><img alt="柒采红" src="https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1002.1002.1024/006VIP8Aly8glszmoahspj30ru0rutaa.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609351564&amp;ssig=fs3wnhutU0" usercard="id=6349731152"></a>

    <!-- 评论头像 -->
    <!-- 评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
    <div class="list_con" node-type="replywrap">
        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/6349731152" usercard="id=6349731152">柒采红</a>：可燃冰:天然气水合物（Natural Gas Hydrate/Gas Hydrate），有机化合物，化学式CH4·nH2O。即可燃冰，是分布于深海沉积物或陆域的永久冻土中，由天然气与水在高压低温条件下形成的类冰状的结晶物质因其外观像冰一样而且遇火即可燃烧，又被称作“可燃冰”（Combustible ice）或者“固体瓦斯”和“汽冰”        </div>
                <!-- 评论图片的处理 -->
                                            <div class="WB_expand_media_box" style="display: none;" node-type="comment_media_disp"></div>

        <!-- 评论-列表 -->

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4486764586529223" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAp8Sroy3?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-26 16:31" date="1585211500000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486764586529223:fromprofile"> 3月26日 16:31</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%BB%9E%E7%95%99%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E7%9A%84%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E8%BF%94%E4%BA%AC%23&amp;from=default">#滞留湖北的北京人员如何返京#</a>？】北京市重点站区管委会副主任毛军：北京西站指挥部正组织滞留湖北的北京人员，通过铁路和公路分批次返京，铁路返京人员将统一由各区安排专车送到居住地和集中观察点，实施14天观察。昨日，第一批829名由铁路离开湖北的返京人员全部顺利抵京，其中居家观察720人，集中 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAp8Sroy3" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486764586529223:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486764586529223&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                <a target="_blank" suda-uatrack="key=click comments&amp;value=click:home:2" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAp8Sroy3?filter=hot&amp;root_comment_id=4486768898735974" action-data="more_comment=small&amp;root_comment_id=4486768898735974&amp;id=">共14条回复</a>
                    </div>
                </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4486759062426335" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAoZYabcr?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-26 16:09" date="1585210183000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486759062426335:fromprofile"> 3月26日 16:09</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%80%BF%E7%88%BD%E6%89%B9%E8%93%AC%E4%BD%A9%E5%A5%A5%E5%86%8D%E6%8F%90%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%23&amp;from=default">#耿爽批蓬佩奥再提武汉病毒#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%8C%91%E8%B5%B7%E4%BA%89%E7%AB%AF%E7%A0%B4%E5%9D%8F%E5%90%88%E4%BD%9C%E7%9A%84%E6%94%BF%E5%AE%A2%E6%97%A0%E9%81%93%E5%BE%B7%E5%8F%AF%E8%A8%80%23&amp;from=default">#挑起争端破坏合作的政客无道德可言#</a>】就蓬佩奥再提“武汉病毒”，外交部发言人耿爽表示，对蓬佩奥的上述言行予以强烈谴责，中方多次指出新冠病毒溯源问题，是个复杂的科学问题，需要听取科学和专业的意见。当前新冠肺炎疫情肆虐全球，美国国内的疫情日益恶化。如果这时 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAoZYabcr" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486759062426335:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486759062426335&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

    <div class="screen_box"><a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="fl_menu"><i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down S_ficon">c</i></a>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4486757301246948" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAoX85eo4?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-26 16:02" date="1585209762000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486757301246948:fromprofile"> 3月26日 16:02</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【直播！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#北京疫情防控工作发布会#</a>】今天，北京市召开疫情防控新闻发布会，市卫健委、市疾控中心、西站地区管委会相关负责人将发布解读，并答记者问。看直播↓↓关注！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4486757301246948:1034-video:1034%3A4486763809275917:page_100206_home:2656274875:4486757301246948:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZwDtUs" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZwDtUs" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【直播！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E9%80%9A%E6%8A%A5%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E8%BF%9B%E5%B1%95%23&amp;from=default">#湖北通报疫情防控最新进展#</a>】今天，湖北省政府新闻办公室召开新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎疫情防控工作新闻发布会，介绍宜昌市、襄阳市稳岗就业和有序复工复产情况，并回答记者提问。关注直播！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4486756873210412:1034-video:1034%3A4486769354145825:page_100206_home:2656274875:4486756873210412:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZweroG" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZweroG" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4486751542204674" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAoNQ9fxg?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-26 15:39" date="1585208390000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486751542204674:fromprofile"> 3月26日 15:39</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【意大利外长：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%9B%9E%E8%B5%A0%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9100%E5%80%8D%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%23&amp;from=default">#中国回赠意大利100倍口罩#</a>】当地时间24日，意大利外长迪马约在接受采访时表示，意大利疫情暴发后，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E4%B8%AA%E5%90%91%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E6%8F%90%E4%BE%9B%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%84%23&amp;from=default">#中国第一个向意大利提供医疗物资#</a>，并派遣医疗专家。“当初武汉疫情暴发时，意大利向中国赠送了4万只口罩，而被指责廉价抛售了用来保护意大利人的物资。如今，中国回赠数百万只口罩。” ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAoNQ9fxg" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486751542204674:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486751542204674&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4486742722135644" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAozC8XzS?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-26 15:04" date="1585206287000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486742722135644:fromprofile"> 3月26日 15:04</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B7%B4%E5%9F%BA%E6%96%AF%E5%9D%A6%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E6%95%B0%E7%A0%B4%E5%8D%83%23&amp;from=default">#巴基斯坦新冠肺炎确诊病例数破千#</a>】当地时间26日据当地媒体报道，巴基斯坦新冠肺炎确诊病例总数过千，有8人死亡。昨日，新增死亡病例是一名50岁妇女，巴基斯坦裔英国公民，大约两周前从英国返回，她所在的村庄及与其密切接触者目前均被隔离并候检。（总台记者崔如） ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数等于1，只显示图片-->

        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->
                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->
            <!-- 二级评论查看更多 -->
                            <div class="list_li_v2" node-type="more_child_comment">
                    <div class="WB_text">
                                                <a target="_blank" suda-uatrack="key=click comments&amp;value=click:home:2" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAozC8XzS?filter=hot&amp;root_comment_id=4486742914675611" action-data="more_comment=small&amp;root_comment_id=4486742914675611&amp;id=">共9条回复</a>
                    </div>
                </div>
                        <div class="between_line S_bg1" node-type="comment_line"></div>
            <!-- 二级评论查看更多 -->
            </div>
        </div>
                         <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

            <!-- 列表-内容 -->
        </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>

                                <a name="4486739156878036" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAotRsRi4?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-26 14:50" date="1585205437000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486739156878036:fromprofile"> 3月26日 14:50</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#全球抗疫第一线#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E6%95%B0%E8%B6%8514%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#意大利美国累计确诊病例数超14万#</a>】一图了解新冠肺炎世界疫情形势，转起关注，共同战疫！ ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609351477&amp;ssig=p%2FfXDSA4Bz" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4486736460101149" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAopw0qjr?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-26 14:39" date="1585204794000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486736460101149:fromprofile"> 3月26日 14:39</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E7%9C%81%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%E7%8E%87%E9%A6%96%E6%AC%A1%E7%AA%81%E7%A0%B490%25%23&amp;from=default">#湖北省治愈率首次突破90%#</a>】截至3月25日24时，湖北省累计治愈出院病例61201例，累计确诊67801例，治愈率超90%。周知，继续加油！ ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【正确示范！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%A9%AC%E5%B8%83%E9%87%8C%E8%87%AA%E6%88%91%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%E8%8E%B7%E5%B1%85%E5%A7%94%E4%BC%9A%E5%A7%90%E5%A7%90%E7%A7%B0%E8%B5%9E%23&amp;from=default">#马布里自我隔离获居委会姐姐称赞#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/a1/2018new_doge02_org.png" title="[doge]" alt="[doge]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】25日，<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E9%A9%AC%E5%B8%83%E9%87%8CMarbury?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=马布里Marbury">@马布里Marbury</a> 结束了14天的隔离，在微博发文“居委会的姐姐们夸我表现优秀”。 18日，马布里在微博中透露自己正在北京自我隔离中，并晒出自己每天测体温的照片。“按照要求，按照规定！听组织的！”网友：正确示范，点赞！ ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%93%AC%E4%BD%A9%E5%A5%A5%E5%86%8D%E6%8F%90%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E9%81%AD%E7%BE%8E%E5%89%8D%E6%94%BF%E8%A6%81%E5%8F%8A%E5%AD%A6%E8%80%85%E6%8A%A8%E5%87%BB%23&amp;from=default">#蓬佩奥再提武汉病毒遭美前政要及学者抨击#</a>】据CNN25日报道，美国国务卿蓬佩奥在会上试图推动将“武汉病毒”一词纳入G7成员国的联合声明当中，但被其他国家明确拒绝，会议未能形成联合声明。蓬佩奥一意孤行将新冠病毒称为“武汉病毒”的行为，也遭到了美国前政要和学者的猛烈抨击。“多么狭隘和可悲 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAofTEsZL" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486730499644581:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486730499644581&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BE%B7%E6%B3%95%E8%81%94%E5%90%88%E5%A3%B0%E6%98%8E%E4%B8%8D%E7%82%B9%E5%90%8D%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E8%93%AC%E4%BD%A9%E5%A5%A5%E8%8D%92%E5%94%90%E8%A8%80%E8%AE%BA%23&amp;from=default">#德法联合声明不点名回应蓬佩奥荒唐言论#</a>】蓬佩奥在会议中对中国“抗疫”努力、中国为国际“抗疫”提供的物资等方面予以攻击、中伤。会后，德国、法国联合声明，强调国际社会应团结合作共同抗击疫情。法国外长勒德里昂强调，不应为政治目的消费当前危机。这被认为是对蓬佩奥荒唐言论的不点名回应。                                            </div>
                                                                        <div class="WB_feed_expand">
                    <div class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg1_br"></i></div>
                    <div class="WB_expand S_bg1" node-type="feed_list_forwardContent">
                                                                            <div class="WB_info">
                                <a suda-uatrack="key=feed_headnick&amp;value=transuser_nick:4486708966402095" node-type="feed_list_originNick" class="W_fb S_txt1" nick-name="央视新闻" bpfilter="page_frame" href="/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_">@央视新闻</a><a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a>                            </div>
                            <div class="WB_text" node-type="feed_list_reason">
                                                                                                                                        【G7外长会<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%93%AC%E4%BD%A9%E5%A5%A5%E5%86%8D%E6%8F%90%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E9%81%AD%E5%90%84%E5%9B%BD%E5%A4%96%E9%95%BF%E5%8F%8D%E5%AF%B9%23&amp;from=default">#蓬佩奥再提武汉病毒遭各国外长反对#</a> 未能达成联合声明】据美联社消息，在25日七国集团（G7）外长视频会议上，各国外长同意要团结协作阻止病毒蔓延，但当美国国务卿迈克·蓬佩奥提议将该病毒称作“武汉病毒”时，遭其他国家外长反对。最终，会议没有发表联合声明。<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6Zwc96d" alt="http://t.cn/A6Zwc96d" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> （央 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486708966402095:2656274875" href="/2656274875/IAnHaqRtB" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486708966402095">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                                            </div>
                                                            <div class="WB_expand_media_box" style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

</div></div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4486714574218084" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAnQdhHjC?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-26 13:12" date="1585199576000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486714574218084:fromprofile"> 3月26日 13:12</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BA%BD%E7%BA%A6%E5%B8%82%E9%95%BF%E8%AF%B4%E5%88%AB%E4%BF%A1%E7%89%B9%E6%9C%97%E6%99%AE%E8%99%9A%E5%B9%BB%E7%9A%84%E5%B8%8C%E6%9C%9B%23&amp;from=default">#纽约市长说别信特朗普虚幻的希望#</a>】特朗普称想让美国在复活节（4月12日）之前“复工”。对此，纽约市市长德布拉西奥嗤之以鼻：“不知道这种想法打哪来的？千万别指望这个虚幻的希望！”（央视记者徐德智） <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4486714574218084:1034-video:1034%3A4486714534854664:page_100206_home:2656274875:4486714574218084:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZwxGc5" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZwxGc5" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2656274875&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4486714574218084"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>11502</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->

        </div>
    </div>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <li><a href="javascript:void(0);" node-type="" action-type="fl_historyEdit" action-data="mid=4486713009428214&amp;domain=100206&amp;is_ori=1&amp;can_edit_count=99" suda-uatrack="">查看编辑记录</a></li>
                                                                                            <li>
                                <span class="hover">
                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IAnNGDyHY&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609351477&amp;ssig=p%2FfXDSA4Bz" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4486713009428214" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAnNGDyHY?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-26 13:06" date="1585199203000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486713009428214:fromprofile"> 3月26日 13:06</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【辽宁<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%A7%E8%BF%9E%E5%87%BA%E7%8E%B0%E9%A6%96%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#大连出现首例境外输入确诊病例#</a>】据大连市卫生健康委，辽宁大连市报告首例境外（美国）输入新冠肺炎确诊病例。患者已在定点医疗机构隔离治疗，病情稳定。<br>患者程某，男，15岁，国内住址：大连市中山区。患者就读于美国纽约长岛某中学。纽约时间3月23日程某从美国纽约肯尼迪机场乘坐日本航空JL5 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAnNGDyHY" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486713009428214:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486713009428214&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4486708966402095" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAnHaqRtB?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-26 12:50" date="1585198239000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486708966402095:fromprofile"> 3月26日 12:50</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【G7外长会<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%93%AC%E4%BD%A9%E5%A5%A5%E5%86%8D%E6%8F%90%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E9%81%AD%E5%90%84%E5%9B%BD%E5%A4%96%E9%95%BF%E5%8F%8D%E5%AF%B9%23&amp;from=default">#蓬佩奥再提武汉病毒遭各国外长反对#</a> 未能达成联合声明】据美联社消息，在25日七国集团（G7）外长视频会议上，各国外长同意要团结协作阻止病毒蔓延，但当美国国务卿迈克·蓬佩奥提议将该病毒称作“武汉病毒”时，遭其他国家外长反对。最终，会议没有发表联合声明。<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6Zwc96d" alt="http://t.cn/A6Zwc96d" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> （央 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAnHaqRtB" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486708966402095:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486708966402095&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BF%84%E7%BD%97%E6%96%AF%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E6%94%BE%E5%81%87%E4%B9%9D%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#俄罗斯全国放假九天#</a> 防止疫情传播】当地时间25日，俄罗斯总统普京发表电视讲话，宣布本月28日到下月5日全国放假，以防止新冠病毒在俄罗斯境内大规模传播，并对奋战一线的医务工作者表示感谢。此前，俄政府拨款建设16座方舱医院，要求各地暂时关闭所有娱乐场所，自本月18日起已暂时限制外国人入境。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAnysuTj3" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486703567362441:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486703567362441&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%23&amp;from=default">#开学时间#</a>【<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/48/2018new_huatong_org.png" title="[话筒]" alt="[话筒]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">转发周知！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%9A%E5%9C%B0%E6%98%8E%E7%A1%AE%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%23&amp;from=default">#多地明确开学时间#</a>】近日，安徽、四川等多地陆续公布开学时间，其中：①安徽高三年级4月7日返校，初三年级4月13日返校；②四川高三年级原则上4月1日开学，初三年级4月7日开学复课；③福建4月7日起分类分批、错时错峰开学，高三年级原则上于4月7日先行同步开学。戳图↓转 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAnjSlAgI" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486694525144308:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486694525144308&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

    <div class="screen_box"><a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="fl_menu"><i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down S_ficon">c</i></a>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4486692348596037" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAngmA4dL?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-26 11:44" date="1585194277000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486692348596037:fromprofile"> 3月26日 11:44</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%B0%86%E5%B8%AE%E5%8A%A9%E5%B7%B4%E5%9F%BA%E6%96%AF%E5%9D%A6%E5%BB%BA%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2%23&amp;from=default">#中国将帮助巴基斯坦建隔离医院#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%AF%B9%E5%B7%B4%E9%93%81%E7%9A%84%E6%8F%B4%E5%8A%A9%E6%9C%89%E5%93%AA%E4%BA%9B%23&amp;from=default">#中国对巴铁的援助有哪些#</a>】国家国际发展合作署副署长邓波清：当前中巴都面临疫情的挑战，中方愿同巴方分享防控经验，向巴方提供抗疫物资，联手应对共同挑战。从开始到现在，我们已分四批向巴方提供各种医疗物资。下一步还准备为巴方提供更多急需医疗物资设备，并将帮 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAngmA4dL" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486692348596037:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486692348596037&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            </li>
        </ul>
    
<!-- /VideoCard -->

    </div>
        <!-- super card-->

            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>

                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->

            <!-- 二级评论查看更多 -->
                            <div class="list_li_v2" node-type="more_child_comment">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A68960%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#美国新冠肺炎确诊68960例#</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%AD%BB%E4%BA%A1%E8%B6%85%E5%8D%83%E4%BA%BA%23&amp;from=default">#美国新冠肺炎死亡超千人#</a>】据约翰斯·霍普金斯大学数据，截至美东时间25日22：59，美国新冠确诊病例为68960例，死亡1041例。（央视记者王逢治） ​​​​                                            </div>

target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" extra-data=\"type=atname\" href=\"\/\/weibo.com\/n\/%E6%9C%B1%E5%B9%BF%E6%9D%83?from=feed&loc=at\" usercard=\"name=朱广权\">@朱广权<\/a> ：寒潮来袭，多地降温超过10℃，原本下岗的棉服又有了新的就业出路，走在保暖时尚最前沿还得靠秋裤。春天里气温按下“随机键”，不要被它前两天的温柔欺骗，衣服的增减要随机应变。网上推出了全国乱穿衣预警地图，快来看看你家降温到什么程度？&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"\/\/weibo.com\/2656274875\/IAqIXDbMv\"                                                                                   【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E5%86%85%E8%88%AA%E7%A9%BA%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8%E8%87%B3%E4%BB%BB%E4%B8%80%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%B6%E8%88%AA%E7%BA%BF%E5%8F%AA%E4%BF%9D%E7%95%991%E6%9D%A1%23&from=default\">#国内航空公司至任一国家航线只保留1条#<\/a>】民航局今天发布通知：进一步调减国际客运航班运行数量。国内每家航空公司经营至任一国家航线只保留1条，每条航线每周运营班次不得超1班；外国每家航空公司经营至我国航线只保留1条，每周运营班次不得超1班。抵离中国航班确保客座率不高于75%。                                                                                   【中共中央国务院：<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E5%8A%B3%E5%8A%A8%E7%B4%A0%E5%85%BB%E8%AF%84%E4%BB%B7%E5%B0%86%E6%88%90%E5%BD%95%E5%8F%96%E9%87%8D%E8%A6%81%E5%8F%82%E8%80%83%23&from=default\">#学生劳动素养评价将成录取重要参考#<\/a>】中共中央、国务院近日发布相关意见，提出要<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E5%9C%A8%E5%A4%A7%E4%B8%AD%E5%B0%8F%E5%AD%A6%E8%AE%BE%E7%AB%8B%E5%8A%B3%E5%8A%A8%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2%E5%BF%85%E4%BF%AE%E8%AF%BE%23&from=default\">#在大中小学设立劳动教育必修课#<\/a>；把劳动素养评价结果作为评优评先的重要参考和毕业依据，作为高一级学校录取的重要参考或依据；让学生动手实践出力流汗、体认劳动不分贵贱，尊重普通劳动者↓&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a
